title: game client is laggy?
body:
I have been trying to play ranked and keep getting retrieving data from server. when in game though I am on my normal ping of 70..
anyone else have this issue?  It was so bad (on my screenshot) that even though i picked a champ it wouldn't let me and then got kicked out >.<

EDIT: 
I just reloaded my client and now after logging in , I can't do anything since its still trying to "retrieve" My speedtest ping is the same as usual and loading up a stream on youtube is as per normal...

anyone else having this issue??

replies.body:
I had a RADS error earlier, so I reinstalled and used the admin version of the PVP kernel to install.

Now I can start, but currently getting the same problem as OP describes.
